titleStmt.title: Anarchie reviving, or, The good old cause on the anvile being a discovery of the present design to retrive the late confusions both of church and state, in several essays for liberty of conscience / by Abraham Philotheus.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Abraham, 1611-1690.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A67152 of text R12351 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing W3684). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 135 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 39 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
